Class TenorFromArray

java.lang.Object
com.guglielmoDelSarto.general.time.TenorFromArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
TenorDiscretization
Direct Known Subclasses:
TenorFromTimes
public class TenorFromArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements TenorDiscretization
Class representing TenorDiscretization starting from an array of double
Since:
Version 1.0
Author:
Guglielmo Del Sarto

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TenorFromArray​(double[] times)
    Create a tenor structure, starting from an array containing:
    [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getLength()
    Return the length of the tenor discretization, which is n for the structure of the kind
    [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
    double getTime​(int tenorIndex)
    Return the time corresponding to the tenor index for the structure of the kind
    [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
    double getTimeStep​(int initialIndex, int finalIndex)
    Return the time step between the two tenor indexes specified for the structure of the kind
    [t = t0, t1, ..., tn-1 = T]
    double getTotalLength()
    Return the length of the period [t, T]
